description: Go-to-market for an AI customer support tool; budget $750k; target SMBs

messages.content:
Thank you for sharing your business idea. It sounds like an interesting project in the AI and customer support space. Let's dive deeper into the details to get a comprehensive understanding of your plan.

To start, could you tell me more about the specific features and capabilities of your AI customer support tool? What key problem does it solve for SMBs?
